name: Monster Simulator
description:
Giant monster on the run, and you are in control. This monster is super strong and is getting very hungry. Smash cars, planes, fire hydrants, people, and anything else not attached to the ground. Help this Monster grow from a little guy in Level 1 to a Giant in Level 200. This game combines elements of rampage style games with adventure games. Complete all 48 missions and over 20 achievements. Try to rank in the Top 10 in the world!

Features:
--4 Huge Maps
--48 Missions
--Loads of achievements
--World Rankings of your Monster
--Combines rampage with adventure
--Excellent 3D graphics and fast gameplay
--The more you play, the more he grows

If you ever wondered what it would be like to take control of a Monster, this is your chance.

Notes: At this point, level 200 is max size for the Monster - -and by Level 200 he will be so big, you will be laughing. This app works best on newer devices.

Connect with us @jellyfishgiant

Monster rules all!
